lines.text: Julie, I made you! I taught you everything you know! How to dress, table manners, how to move, how to make love...
Why me? Why did you pick me?
Because you were framable. You've stepped on too many toes. Nobody ever cared about you. I never even liked you much myself.
I've got to go to the health club.

[to Leon]
Who's down there? Your new boyfriend? You motherfucker!
How many languages do you speak?
This is my apartment. Women don't come here.
Now slap her. Slap that cunt.
I know a whore when I see one. How much?

[begs to Leon]
I'll do fag tricks. I'll do kink. I'll do anything you want me to do.
